properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 2:50AM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snowfall in excess of 4 inches expected above 3000 feet.

* WHERE...Northern Trinity County.

* WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday
morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous travel conditions are expected
across Scott Mountain Summit on Highway 3.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state of California can be
obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET
